鱳字的基本解释

鱳
lè
古代传说的一种怪鱼，形状像鲤鱼，长有鸟尾和六只脚。

鱳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《集韻》狼狄切，入錫，來。］
鱼名。即鰅鱼。
[②]［lù］
［《集韻》盧谷切，入屋，來。］
见“鱳2得”。

鱳字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鱳； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页1480第14
【唐韻】盧各切【集韻】歷各切，?音洛。【說文】魚名。出樂浪潘國。【類篇】或作?。又【集韻】盧谷切，音祿。義同。又狼狄切，音歷lì。?或作鱳。

鱳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鱳字的起名意思

暂无。

Poo
Basic explanation of words
Poo
lè
A strange fish in ancient legend, shaped like a carp, with a bird tail and six feet.
Poo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Ji Yun" Lang Di cut, enter the tin, come. ]
The name of the fish. That is, the mackerel.
[②]［lù］
["Ji Yun" Lu Guqi, enter the house, come. ]
See "鱳2得".
Poo
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鱳; Kangxi Strokes: 26; Page Number: Page 1480 Page 14
[Tang Yun] Lu Geqie [Jiyun] Li Geqie,? Yinluo. [Said the text] The name of the fish. Le Lang Pan Guo. 【Classes】Or for?. Also 【Jiyun】Lu Guqie, Yinlu. The same meaning. Lang Diqie again, sound calendar lì. ? Or as 鱳.
Poo
